Name: The Past
About the game: Game Plot: Returning home from school, Enes is sent out by his mother. He hears a voice from outside and events begin. Waking up in a platform-like place, Enes tries to understand the events and get rid of them. At that time, the sound coming from the megaphones placed in certain parts of the platform starts to direct Enes. Will Enes be able to find out why he is here? What adventures await Enes in the full version of the game? The Past is an exploration-themed psychological horror game. The game is story-based and the player is given tasks in a linear structure. Game content: Can you solve the mystery in The Past, which is based on puzzles and a story? Ambience: The area that resembles a platform in places, memories of Enes from time to time...
